page.title: 10 EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: A typical job locally is that of sales clerk at British Industrial Sand.This is described as interesting because of the many and varied poeple to speak to on the telephone.The job is not particularly well paid but it is handy to most poeple in Oakamoor.There are a lot of orders for clay and sand everyday. Most of the time staff are kept busy because of telephone calls. In the summer they are more busy than in the winter but they still need alot of sand and grit to put on the roads when there is snow on the ground.B.I.S. deliver their products by lorry or train to as far away as Cornwall and Scotland and countries abroad. As well as sales clerk there are many more jobs at B.I.S. like engineers,shot firers,machine operators,drivers,fore -men,directors,gardeners and general labourers.
